attributes.action: lift VAT on Estate Agents & Solicitor Fees...for six months
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would really help many stretched buyers
and get the housing market going again. 

Would save many estate and letting jobs, not to mention jobs in the removals and home products industry.

And it would be great government PR with neutral cost, since a stagnant market doesn't raise a VAT income anyway.
